description: Ms. codex. Collective title from text 1, fol. 2b. Physical description: 17 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Text framed in red. Rubrication and catchwords. Some damp staining; a few leaves are detached. In good condition. Incipit (text 1): الحمد لله رب العالمىن خلق السموات و الارض لا اله الا هو الحى الذى لىس کمثله شىء
contents: 1. fol. 2b-10b: Hâzâ Kitab-ı Hazret-i Imam-ı Cafer as-Sadık aleyhüsselam. Short treatise on the principles of Sufism attributed to Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq; published as Fakrname.
4. fol. 17a-21a: Çiraǧ uyandıre çok kimsine beyanındadır.
extent: 32 leaves : paper ; 221 x 142 (158 x 89) mm bound to 221 x 144 mm

title.@value: هذا کتاب حضرت امام جعفر الصادق علىه السلام.
Hâzâ Kitab-ı Hazret-i Imam-ı Cafer as-Sadık aleyhüsselam ... [etc.].

subject: Bektashi
binding_note: Three-quarter leather with embossed green paper covers; green paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
